mapper.select: SELECT "menu_master"."master_cd", "menu_master"."master_namekey", "menu_master"."master_desc", "menu_master"."master_order", "menu_master"."master_url", "menu_master"."master_icon", "menu_sub"."sub_cd", "menu_sub"."subname_key", "menu_sub"."sub_desc", "menu_sub"."sub_order", "menu_sub"."sub_Url", "menu_sub"."sub_icon", "menu_sub"."controller_mapping" FROM "menu_master" RIGHT OUTER JOIN "menu_sub" ON "menu_master"."master_cd" = "menu_sub"."master_cd" WHERE "menu_sub"."display_yn" = TRUE ORDER BY "menu_master"."master_order", "menu_sub"."sub_order";
SELECT count(*) AS total FROM SYSTEM_USER_INFO WHERE (user_id like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR user_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')) and site_id=#{site_id}
mapper.insert: SET TIMEZONE TO '${time_zone}'; INSERT into system_user_info (site_id, user_id, user_pw, user_name, group_id, dept_name, position_name, phone_num, mobile_num, email, mysingle_yn, insert_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{site_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{group_id}, #{dept_name}, #{position_name}, #{phone_num}, #{mobile_num}, #{email}, false, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT site_id,group_id,group_name,group_desc FROM system_user_group;

SELECT si.site_name, sg.group_name, sg.group_desc,sg.group_id FROM system_user_group as sg, site_info as si WHERE sg.site_id = si.site_id and sg.site_id=#{site_id} and (si.site_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR sg.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR sg.group_desc like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')) ORDER BY ${orderColumn} ${orderType};
mapper.insert: INSERT into system_user_group (site_id, group_name, group_desc) VALUES (#{site_id}, #{group_name}, #{group_desc});
mapper.select: SELECT site_id, site_name, site_code, description, site_master FROM site_info;
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_code, description, site_master FROM site_info where site_id=#{site_id};

SELECT site_id,site_name,site_code,description FROM site_info WHERE site_code like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR site_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR description like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY ${orderColumn} ${orderType};
mapper.insert: INSERT into site_info ( site_name, site_code, description) VALUES (#{site_name}, #{site_code}, #{description});
mapper.select: SELECT "network".*, "range"."start_ip" AS "dhcp_start_ip", "range"."end_ip" as "dhcp_end_ip" FROM "view_network_ip_status" as "network", "dhcp_range" AS "range" WHERE "network"."site_id" = "range"."site_id" and "network"."network" = "range"."network" and "network"."site_id" = #{siteid} AND "network"."network" = #{network} ORDER BY inet("network"."network")

SET TIMEZONE TO '${time_zone}'; SELECT * FROM ( SELECT "site_id", "network", "ipaddr", "macaddr", COALESCE("is_conflict", FALSE) AS "is_conflict", "conflict_types", "status", "lease_state", "obj_types", "usage", "host_name", "host_os","fingerprint", COALESCE("is_never_ends", FALSE) AS "is_never_ends", COALESCE("is_never_start", FALSE) AS "is_never_start", COALESCE(to_char("lease_start_time",'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS "lease_start_time", COALESCE(to_char("lease_end_time",'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS "lease_end_time" FROM "dhcp_ip_status" AS "t_ip" UNION ALL SELECT "site_id", "network", "ipaddr", "macaddr", FALSE AS "is_conflict", '' AS "conflict_types", 'FIXED' AS "status", 'FIXED' AS "lease_state", '' AS "obj_types", '' AS "usage", '' AS "host_name", '' AS "host_os", '' AS "fingerprint", FALSE AS "is_never_ends", FALSE AS "is_never_start", '' AS "lease_start_time", '' AS "lease_end_time" FROM "dhcp_fixed_ip" AS "t_fixed") as "t_map" WHERE "t_map"."site_id" = #{siteid} AND "t_map"."network" = #{network} ORDER BY inet("t_map"."ipaddr")

select COALESCE(am.auth_menu_id,-1) as auth_menu_id, COALESCE(am.auth_state,'N') as auth_state,ms.master_cd,ms.sub_cd,sug.site_id,sug.group_id from auth_menu as am right outer join (menu_sub as ms natural join system_user_group as sug) on am.group_id = sug.group_id and am.site_id = sug.site_id and am.master_cd = ms.master_cd and am.sub_cd =ms.sub_cd where sug.site_id=#{site_id} and ms.master_cd != 'M01' order by ms.master_cd,ms.sub_cd,sug.group_id
select group_id,group_name from system_user_group where site_id = #{site_id}
select master_cd,master_namekey from menu_master where master_cd != 'M01';
select master_cd,sub_cd,subname_key from menu_sub where master_cd != 'M01';
mapper.update: UPDATE auth_menu SET auth_state=#{auth_state} WHERE auth_menu_id=#{auth_menu_id};

SELECT DISTINCT model FROM view_client_info WHERE model IS NOT NULL AND vendor = #{vendor} AND os like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%';
SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM view_client_info WHERE hostname IS NOT NULL AND os like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%';
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM view_client_info WHERE device_type IS NOT NULL AND os like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%';

SELECT "black"."blacklist_id", "black"."site_id", "site"."site_name", COALESCE("black"."blacklist_enable", FALSE) AS "blacklist_enable", COALESCE("black"."blacklist_filter_name", '') AS "blacklist_filter_name", COALESCE("black"."blacklist_time_sec", 0) AS "blacklist_time_sec", COALESCE("black"."description", '') AS "description", "rowCount"."allCount" FROM "site_blacklist_info" AS "black", "site_info" AS "site", (SELECT COUNT("black".*) AS "allCount" FROM "site_blacklist_info" AS "black" WHere "site_id" = #{siteid}) AS "rowCount" WHERE "black"."site_id" = "site"."site_id" AND "black"."site_id" = #{siteid} ORDER BY ${orderColumn} ${orderType} OFFSET #{startIndex} LIMIT #{length};
